thread.title: Watch Julian Edelman defy Falcons' defense, reality with insane catch
thread.title_full: Watch Julian Edelman defy Falcons' defense, reality with insane catch

title: Watch Julian Edelman defy Falcons' defense, reality with insane catch
text:
Driving for the game-tying touchdown, Tom Brady went to his favorite target. And Julian Edelman delivered.
Making a catch worthy of the NFL’s biggest game, Edelman snagged the ball that seemed to levitate just about the ground. Replays revealed just how miraculous the catch ended up being:
sdflka;sdjf;kzjdfc;alksejf;lkasdjf;lkasjdf;lkjasdf;lkjasdlfk;cjasd;lkfjaslkdf #SB51 pic.twitter.com/GCkEJilvzV
— NFL (@NFL) February 6, 2017
